item.title: OK, So He’s Gone. What Now?
item.description: So I woke up this morning to the news. Obama Killed Osama. In my groggy state, I couldn't really piece together what was happening on my collated facebook and twitter streams until I saw something similar to the previous sentence. I think the first thing I cognized was a friend's facebook post: ‘Osama, so 10 years ago.’
